text: The Holyland Model of Jerusalem is a model of Old City of Jerusalem from the period of the Second Temple. It was first held in the Holyland Hotel in Jerusalem. It was opened in 1966, together with other models of ancient structure models of Israel. In 2006 the model was moved to a new site in the Israel Museum. == Other websites == * Israeli museum website Category:Temple Mount Category:Buildings and structures in Jerusalem
title: Holyland Model of Jerusalem
